Scenario: Scholarship eligibility based on demonstrated stewardship
    Given Marcus demonstrates exceptional capability and commitment
    And scholarships should go to deserving students
    When scholarship decisions are made
    Then Marcus's household stewardship should be powerful evidence
    And his care contributions should qualify as exceptional achievement
    And community should invest in young people proving their capability
    And care economy framework should influence scholarship criteria
    And his real-world responsibility should be valued over traditional metrics
    And educational opportunity should flow to those demonstrating care
